# Data Model Suggestions

**Generated by Requirements Gathering Agent v2.0.0**  
**Category:** technical-analysis  
**Generated:** 2025-06-02T23:31:47.129Z  
**Description:** Database architecture and data model recommendations

---

Given the detailed project context for an AI-powered Requirements Gathering and PMBOK Documentation Generator tool supporting multiple AI providers, the data models should capture:

- Project strategic data and context
- PMBOK-aligned documents and artifacts
- AI provider configurations and usage
- User roles and stakeholder information
- Generated documents and versions
- Traceability and relationships among artifacts

---

# Suggested Comprehensive Data Models

---

## 1. **Project**

Represents a managed project instance with strategic info and associated artifacts.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| projectId              | UUID (PK)           | Unique identifier                             |
| name                   | String              | Project name                                 |
| description            | Text                | Full project description/context bundle      |
| businessProblem        | Text                | Business problem statement                    |
| technologyStack        | Array[String]       | Technologies used/planned                     |
| createdAt              | DateTime            | Creation timestamp                            |
| updatedAt              | DateTime            | Last update timestamp                         |
| ownerUserId            | UUID (FK)           | Owner/creator user reference                  |
| status                 | Enum (Active/Archived/Completed) | Project lifecycle status       |

---

## 2. **StrategicSection**

Stores generated strategic planning outputs.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| strategicSectionId     | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Related project                               |
| vision                 | Text                | Project vision statement                      |
| mission                | Text                | Mission statement                             |
| coreValues             | Text                | Core values statement                         |
| purpose                | Text                | Purpose statement                             |
| generatedAt            | DateTime            | Timestamp of generation                       |

---

## 3. **RoleRequirement**

Captures user roles, needs, and processes.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| roleRequirementId      | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Associated project                            |
| role                   | String              | Role name                                     |
| needs                  | Array[String]       | List of needs for this role                   |
| processes              | Array[String]       | List of processes related to the role        |

---

## 4. **Stakeholder**

Details about stakeholders for the Stakeholder Register.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| stakeholderId          | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Project reference                             |
| name                   | String              | Stakeholder name                              |
| role                   | String              | Role or title                                |
| influenceLevel         | Enum (High/Medium/Low) | Influence on project                        |
| interestLevel          | Enum (High/Medium/Low) | Interest in project                         |
| contactInfo            | JSON / Object       | Contact details (email, phone, etc.)          |
| engagementStrategy     | Text                | How to engage the stakeholder                 |

---

## 5. **PMBOKDocument**

Represents any generated PMBOK document (charter, plans, registers, etc.).

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| documentId             | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Related project                               |
| type                   | Enum                | Document type (e.g., ProjectCharter, ScopePlan, RiskPlan, WBS, etc.) |
| content                | Text / JSON         | Document content, text or structured JSON    |
| version                | Integer             | Version number                               |
| generatedAt            | DateTime            | Timestamp of generation                       |
| sourceInput            | JSON                | Input parameters or context used for generation |
| aiProvider             | String              | AI provider used (AzureOpenAI, Ollama, GitHub, etc.) |
| modelUsed              | String              | AI model name/version                         |

---

## 6. **WorkBreakdownStructure (WBS)**

Hierarchical decomposition for project scope.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| wbsId                  | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Project reference                             |
| parentWbsId            | UUID (FK, nullable) | Parent WBS item for hierarchy                 |
| code                   | String              | WBS code (e.g., 1.1, 1.2.3)                  |
| name                   | String              | Name of the work package                      |
| description            | Text                | Detailed description                          |
| deliverables           | Text                | Deliverables associated                       |
| startDate              | Date                | Planned start                                |
| endDate                | Date                | Planned end                                  |
| resources              | JSON / Array        | Resources assigned                            |

---

## 7. **Activity**

Project activities (from Activity List).

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| activityId             | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Project reference                             |
| wbsId                  | UUID (FK)           | Related WBS item                              |
| name                   | String              | Activity name                                |
| description            | Text                | Activity details                             |
| durationEstimate       | Integer (hours/days)| Estimated duration                            |
| resourcesEstimate      | JSON / Array        | Resources required                            |
| dependencies           | Array[UUID]         | IDs of dependent activities                   |
| startDate              | Date                | Planned start                                |
| endDate                | Date                | Planned end                                  |

---

## 8. **Milestone**

Key project milestones.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| milestoneId            | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Project reference                             |
| name                   | String              | Milestone name                               |
| description            | Text                | Details                                     |
| targetDate             | Date                | Planned milestone date                        |
| achievedDate           | Date (nullable)     | Actual date achieved                          |

---

## 9. **Risk**

For risk analysis and management.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| riskId                 | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Project reference                             |
| description            | Text                | Risk description                             |
| category               | String              | Risk category (technical, schedule, cost, etc.)|
| probability            | Float (0-1)         | Likelihood of occurrence                      |
| impact                 | Enum (Low/Medium/High) | Potential impact level                      |
| mitigationPlan         | Text                | Planned mitigation strategies                 |
| status                 | Enum (Identified/Analyzed/Resolved) | Current status                 |
| ownerUserId            | UUID (FK)           | Risk owner                                   |

---

## 10. **ComplianceConsideration**

Regulatory and standards compliance info.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| complianceId           | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Project reference                             |
| regulationName         | String              | Compliance standard or regulation name       |
| description            | Text                | Details about compliance needs                |
| applicable             | Boolean             | If applicable to the project                   |
| compliancePlan         | Text                | Plan for compliance                            |

---

## 11. **UiUxConsideration**

User interface and experience guidelines.

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| uiuxId                 | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId              | UUID (FK)           | Project reference                             |
| guidelines             | Text                | Design guidelines and considerations          |
| accessibility          | Text                | Accessibility standards and measures           |
| branding               | Text                | Branding and style considerations              |

---

## 12. **AiProviderConfig**

Stores configuration for AI providers (multi-provider support).

| Field                  | Type                | Description                                   |
|------------------------|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| configId               | UUID (PK)           | Unique ID                                     |
| projectId (nullable)   | UUID (FK) or null   | Optional per-project override                  |
| providerName           | Enum (AzureOpenAI, GitHubAI, Ollama, AzureAIStudio) | Provider name     |
| endpoint               | String              | API endpoint URL                              |
| authenticationType     | Enum (APIKey, EntraID, Token, None) | Auth method            |
| apiKey                 | Encrypted String    | API key or token                              |
| entraIdInfo            | JSON                | Entra ID details (tenant, client ID)          |
| modelName              | String              | AI model to use                               |
| priority               | Integer             | Priority for fallback mechanism                |
| isActive               | Boolean             | Whether config is active                       |
| createdAt              | DateTime            | Timestamp                                     |
| updatedAt              | DateTime
